name: Mashi-Ninja
description:
Mashi-Ninja is a tribute to the glory of the golden arcade age. Control a small ninja and slash your way through endless waves of enemies, using your dash to slip through their fingers.

  • Hand-drawn animations
  • Simple and juicy controls – left click to attack (hold for charging). Right click to dash

What's your best highscore?

Development: Mashikouli - https://twitter.com/mashikouli
